wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Most resources in LiveFX can be updated but Profiles are unfortunately read-only at this point. http://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/en-US/liveframework/thread/81ab8f62-3244-4ca5-b376-2d5879f47c9f/
For another example of IronPython + LiveFX, check out this blog post from Ori Amiga, the Group PM of LiveFX. Ori loves IronPython so if there's anything you think of that would make LiveFX more IronPython-friendly, he would be the guy to contact. http://blogs.msdn.com/oriamiga/archive/2008/11/09/livefx-using-ironpython.aspx
